main event: Two observers sighted a strange aerial object in Blue Ash, Cincinnati, Ohio on October 7, 1956.
interesting points: Both observers independently described the object as oval or disc-shaped,The object was estimated to be 30 to 40 feet in diameter,It was observed silently hovering at approximately 3,000 feet,The object emanated a bright white light from its surface,The object suddenly accelerated at a very high rate of speed and disappeared from view.
witness description: Mr. John Smith (standing outside his home) and Mrs. Mary Jones (driving her automobile)
